Dialogues.DialogueText: Welcome to Sokoban! Use the arrow keys ‚¨ÜÔ∏è ‚¨áÔ∏è ‚¨ÖÔ∏è ‚û°Ô∏è  to move your character. [Press 'Space' to proceed] ‚è©
